words.hint: Someone who is completely obsessed with their own beauty and self
The tool travelers used for centuries to find magnetic north
An area where a driver or person simply cannot see what is happening

The mysterious ocean zone where vessels supposedly disappear
Something tempting that you are strictly not allowed to have

A movie about choosing between a red pill and a simulated reality

A small, harmless untruth told to spare someone's feelings
Holding your phone out to snap a picture of your own face

Showing off your wealth or success to make others jealous
Doing something quietly or secretly without drawing attention
